content: Amitabh Bachchan is an Indian actor who works in Hindi cinema. He is often considered one of the greatest, most accomplished, and commercially successful actors in the history of Indian cinema.
NAAC stands for National Assessment and Accreditation Council. It is an autonomous body that assesses and accredits higher education institutions in India.
